alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 3:17PM CDT until May 07 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Loup County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Custer County in central Nebraska... Southern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 317 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dunning, or 15 miles southwest of Brewster, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brewster, Dunning, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Linscott and Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 229 and 252. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
